titleStmt.title: SII 7.21: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 21. (A.R. No. 21 of 1900). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE MANDAPA IN FRONT OF THE ILAMISVARA TEMPLE IN THE SAME VILLAGE.

revisionDesc.change: Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śubhamastu .
svasti śrī . vijayātbudhaya kaliyuga varuṣam 4 1000 6 100 4 10 2 Itaṉmeṟ cellāniṉṟa pilava varuṣam cittirai mātam 1 śrīmaṉ rājādhirāja parameśvara śrī Accuta- de vamahārā yar vijayanakarasiṁ hāsaṉattil Iruntu rā cciyam paṇṇiaruḷāniṉṟa kālattu Avar Ūḻiyam Irāmappaṉāyakkaṟkuk kuṉṟatturtuṟkam cellumaṉṉāḷil koṅkāṉa vīracoḻamaṇṭalattu vaṭapūvāṇiyanāṭṭut tāramaṅkalam
veḷḷāḻar nīlaṅkiḻār masta kakuṭori makuṭacūṭāmaṇi vaṇṇattaṭukkum vāṭāmālaiyum pulikkoṭiyum yuḷḷa vaṇaṅkāmuṭimutaliyār nalluṭaiappar koṭṭai mutaliyār Immaṭikaṭṭi mutaliyār citampara ttil Aṉṉāyaṉār tirukkoyilukkut teṟku muṉṟām vītiyil ceṅkaḻunīrppiḷḷaiyār caṉṉatippuṟattut teṉciṟakil nilam ṭṭa 2 100- kkuk koṇṭu vaṇaṅkāmuṭi Eṉṉum maṭaṅ kaṭṭi
viccu Ammaṭattil ma heśvara pūjai naṭakkumpaṭikku Iṉṉāṭṭup paṭaivīṭṭu naṉcey puṉcey nāṟpāṅkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa cakalasvāmya mum viṭṭu Eṅkaḷ kāṇiyāṉa Eḻukaraināṭṭukkuḷḷāka naṭakku mupaiyamāṟkattil nāṉku ticai Aṉpattāṟu tecappalarāl dharmma cātaṉamum Eḻutiviccukkoṇṭu makamaiyuṅ kaṭṭiviccuk kuṭutta viparam piṭavaikkaṭṭu 1- kku ṭṭavaḥ- pākku miḷaku kālnaṭai 1- kku ṭṭa � Eḷḷuppoti 1- kku ṭṭa pama nūl
pañcu parutti Āvaṇakkumuttut tavacappoti kālnaṭaikku ṭṭa pa cevakku ṭṭa pama muttup pavaḷam paṉinīrccempu cantaṉaṅ kastūri kaṟpūram paṭṭunūl Iracakuṭukkai veḷḷāṭṭi taṇṭikaik kompu callicavaram ciccilikkaṭṭu Ivaikkellām kūṭiṉa tīrvaiyil ṭṭa 10- kku ṭṭa I maṟṟumuḷḷa payiṟku mipra kāran tīrntu candrātidya- varai naṭakkumpaṭiyuṅ kaṭṭup paṇṇikkuṭutteṉ Ittarmma ttai vilakkiṉavaṉ puṇya
kālattil gaṅ kaikkaraiyil brāhma ṇaṉai vataittavaṉpāvaṅ koḷḷakkaṭavaṉ Ivai cellapperumāḷ Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 7.21 by automatically converted to DHARMA conventions.
